40.1.hd_quote: The ability to relax and enjoy the fruits of one's labours.
40.1.behavioral_axis: After commitment, withdraws to restore the ego/will so it can serve again.
40.1.shadow_axis: Won’t rest; stays busy to avoid aloneness → burnout.

40.2.hd_quote: The power and authority in deliverance to shed forever the qualities which hampered liberation.
40.2.behavioral_axis: Uses will to cut away what weakened the tribe or the bargain.
40.2.shadow_axis: Loneliness sympathizes with what should have been cut.

40.3.hd_quote: The capacity of the ego to avoid negative forces even if it means being alone.
40.3.behavioral_axis: Chooses solitude over bad alliances; stays unseen to preserve will.
40.3.shadow_axis: Demands attention just to prove worth → drains ego.

40.4.hd_quote: The power to transform and to organize in order to maintain deliverance.
40.4.behavioral_axis: Builds the system so deliverance (freedom, rest, will) stays protected.
40.4.shadow_axis: Over-organizes; gathers bodies not quality → destabilizes.

40.5.hd_quote: The recognition that to achieve liberation all negative forces must be rejected.
40.5.behavioral_axis: Protects tribal will by cutting every misaligned relationship.
40.5.shadow_axis: So rigid it won’t let in support when alone.

40.6.hd_quote: The necessary destruction of inferior forces before liberation can take place.
40.6.behavioral_axis: Uses authority to remove only what truly endangers the group.
40.6.shadow_axis: Extends punishment to whole classes → terror state.
